contentrichtext.text: '''''Ideas and Action''''' is an [[Anarcho-syndicalism|anarcho-syndicalist]] [[Magazine|journal]] that was founded in 1981 as a result of numerous conferences organized by the New York Metropolitan area [[Libertarian Workers' Group]] and the Syndicalist Alliance of Milwaukee. In 1984, the newly formed [[Workers Solidarity Alliance]] took over publication of the journal. Publication of ''Ideas and Action'' was suspended after issue #17 (1997). In 2010, an online version of the publication was launched and continues to publish new material. ==External links== *[http://ideasandaction.info/ The current ''ideas & action'' website] *[http://www.uncanny.net/~wsa Articles from Ideas and Action] {{US-poli-mag-stub}} {{Anarchism}} [[Category:American political magazines]] [[Category:Anarchist periodicals]] [[Category:Magazines established in 1981]]
